org.apache.flex.compiler.clients

Class COMPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.MXMLC
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.COMPC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.flex.tools.FlexTool

    public class COMPC
extends MXMLC
implements org.apache.flex.tools.FlexTool
    Component compiler entry point.

    This class is a quick start of component compiler. It depends on most of the functionalities developed for mxmlc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • setupTargetFile

        protected boolean setupTargetFile()
                           throws InterruptedException
